title: Week 11 Recap: Chiefs' Comeback, Saints' Success, and Winners and Losers | The Ringer NFL Show
description:
Kevin and Nora start by discussing another comeback win for Patrick Mahomes and the Kansas City Chiefs (3:50). Then they talk about the Indianapolis Colts' wild win over the Green Bay Packers (16:27). After that they give out their winners and losers for Week 11 (35:17) and answer some listener questions (1:16:45).
Hosts: Kevin Clark and Nora Princiotti
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
